subject: LDAP Mock Server?
msgSnippet: I m writting a set of methods that will access an LDAP server.  The methods will perform the full spectrum (Update, Search, Add) of LDAP operations.  I would
messageBody:
I'm writting a set of methods that will access an LDAP server. The
methods will perform the full spectrum (Update, Search, Add) of LDAP
operations. I would like to write the JUNIT TestCases using a mock
LDAP server. Can someone suggest an open source mock object that
represents an LDAP server?
